title: windows pe build 6519
description:
Microsoft Windows Pre-instalation environment (windows pe)

build: 6519
os version: windows 7 milestone 1

system specs:
most processors
600mb ram or more
no hdd needed
no sound needed
keyboard and mouse
displays 800x600 at 32bit on almost any video card
this is X86 or 32bit

info:
Windows Preinstallation Environment (WinPE) is a lightweight version of Windows Windows Vista or windows 7 that is used for the deployment of workstations and servers. It is intended as a 32-bit or 64-bit replacement for MS-DOS during the installation phase of Windows, and can be booted via PXE, CD-ROM, USB flash drive or hard disk. Traditionally used by large corporations and OEMs (to preinstall Windows client operating systems to PCs during manufacturing), it is now widely available free of charge via the Windows Automated Installation Kit (WAIK

instructions of use:

NOTE: windows pe has verry limited drivers so don't expect your flash drive or printer to work about the only usb thing i think works is a usb hdd

when you download you download a iso file called x86_pe.iso
that is the windows pe image

you can either run this iso on a vm (virtual machiene) or burn it to a cd and boot your computer off it.

i am aware of the long loading times for this version
no this is not fake
no it is not vista
no it is not crap
no it is not xp
yes it is bootable
yes you can edit this using WAIK from microsoft
yes i am running out of things to say about it

my style:
i have used bart's pe's nu2menu in this and modded it to my likings also i have used a43 file managment utility and other stuff
bart's pe is only windows pe 1.5 or the windows xp pe
i have changed the nu2menu's go button to the vista start orb and added a fake taskbar with a custom hp background and modded some colours and added apps and games also put branding in it ect

it is worth a look and i realy enjoyed making it (by that i mean when it was in its eairlier build 6000 i deleted it and had to re-build it and then my computer crashed and once again i had to rebuild it)

this is the current build and i am always doing updates to it so i will prob put more stuff up on it.

most of the apps are 3rd party apps and are all free or open source

feel free to give me some ideas for future builds.

thats about it enjoy :)
